isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL 9, 10, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS - INSTALL - SHIFT LEVER AND TOWER ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Make sure the transmission is in the NEUTRAL position (Figure 358).

figure.caption: Figure 358. Make Sure Transmission is in Neutral Position

caution.para: The aluminum housing uses a gasket that is different from the gasket on the cast iron housing. Use the correct gasket. If the wrong gasket is used, the area between the shift tower housing and the top cover housing will leak.

step1.para: Install a new gasket for the shift tower housing on the top cover housing.
Put the shift tower housing in position on the top cover housing. Make sure the bottom of the lower shift lever is correctly installed between the forks and the sleeves in the top cover housing.
Install the mounting bolts and washers on the shift tower housing. Tighten the bolts to 48 to 61 Nm (35 to 45 ft-lbs.) in the sequence shown in Figure 359.
Install the cover (if used) around the shift tower housing.
